mapper.insert: insert into member ( NUM, ID, PASSWORD, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ZIPCODE, ADDR1, ADDR2 ) values ( MEMBER_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PASSWORD, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{NAME, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PHONE, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EMAIL, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ZIPCODE, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ADDR1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ADDR2, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID,NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE NAME = #{NAME} AND EMAIL = #{EMAIL}
SELECT NAME, EMAIL FROM MEMBER WHERE NAME = #{NAME} AND EMAIL = #{EMAIL}
SELECT COUNT(EMAIL) FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{EMAIL}
SELECT PASSWORD FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{ID} AND NAME = #{NAME} AND EMAIL = #{EMAIL}
